title: Detect and Ban Bot Accounts
description: An agent needs to run a routine check to identify and ban bot accounts that are farming in-game resources.

tasks.description: Run a query to find accounts with suspicious activity patterns (e.g., 24/7 uptime, repetitive actions).
tasks.expected_outcome: The query returns a list of 500 suspicious accounts.

tasks.description: Review the data for the top 10 most suspicious accounts to confirm the botting behavior.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent manually confirms the accounts are bots.

tasks.description: Execute a script to ban all 500 identified bot accounts.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully runs the bulk-ban script.
